project1.name: Portfolio Website
project1.description: This is my portfolio website. Look around to see the features!

project2.name: Petition
project2.description: This is a website for a petition. Users can register, add information to their profile and sign the petition.

project3.name: Connect 4
project3.description: This is an implementation of the classic Connect-4 game for 2 players.

project4.name: Mobile flashcards
project4.description: A simple flashcard App built with React Native. You can create decks with questions, add questions and take a quiz. There is also a function to create daily reminders.

project5.name: Bubble diagram D3.js
project5.description: This is an interactive bubble diagram I created from a database export of the World Cube Association (WCA). It visualizes the competitors who attended the most competitions.
